mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: DataStage originated at VMark Software (1996-1997). VMark and Unidata merged in 1997 to form Ardent Software, which was acquired by Informix in 1999. In 2001, IBM acquired Informix's database business and DataStage was spun off as part of independent Ascential Software. Market-leading ETL vendor competing directly with Informatica.

2000.note: DataStage originated at VMark Software (1996-1997). VMark and Unidata merged in 1997 to form Ardent Software, which was acquired by Informix in 1999.
